description.raw:
* Kill camera control so there's no conflict. Navigation prevented when:

1.  inserting models (temp model attached to pointer)

2. using manipulator (manipulator hovered / dragged / touched)

3. using radial menu

4. pointer (mouse or touch) is over menu (for now only left panel)

* Radial menu shouldn't open during insert anymore

* Radial menu shouldn't keep appearing when long press changes place

* Improve handle / object selection (for example, when in translate mode, the hidden rotate handles don't interfere on object selection)
description.html:
• Kill camera control so there's no conflict. Navigation prevented when:

  1. inserting models (temp model attached to pointer)

  2. using manipulator (manipulator hovered / dragged / touched)

  3. using radial menu

  4. pointer (mouse or touch) is over menu (for now only left panel)

  • Radial menu shouldn't open during insert anymore

  • Radial menu shouldn't keep appearing when long press changes place

  • Improve handle / object selection (for example, when in translate mode, the hidden rotate handles don't interfere on object selection)

title.raw: Change kill navigation logic, radial menu show fix, fix selecting handle
